title: My Sins Are All Taken Away
author: J. B. Pounds

verses.text:
I was sad and death my soul of its sorrows,
My sins are all taken away;
There will be no more sorrow for me,
My sins are all taken away.

At the foot of the cross they're lying,
My sins are all taken away;

Now the sweet and good of God I see,

For the pow - er of grace in Jesus my pow - er,
My sins are all taken away;
I will walk in the light of God's love,
